title: Transfer Stock to Another Store
description: A nearby store is out of a key item, and the district manager has asked this store to transfer some of its stock to them.

tasks.description: Create a 'Stock Transfer Out' request in the inventory system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The associate initiates the transfer process.

tasks.description: Enter the item number, the quantity being transferred, and the destination store.
tasks.expected_outcome: The details of the transfer are accurately recorded.

tasks.description: Pack the items and ship them. The system deducts the inventory from the sending store and places it in an 'in-transit' status.
tasks.expected_outcome: The inventory is accurately tracked as it moves between locations.
